rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg001
rows.name:
Hey, Kagutsuchi! I found something
interesting in that shop over there.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg002
rows.name: Interesting?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg003
rows.name:
Yep.
Here it is.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg004
rows.name:
What is that thing?
It looks...quite grotesque...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg005
rows.name: Why, that's an Avaritia Monkfish.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg006
rows.name:
You are familiar with this creature,
Meleph-sama?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg007
rows.name:
It's a rare delicacy that is only found in
the waters around here. Rather tasty.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg008
rows.name: People...eat this monstrous fish thing?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg009
rows.name:
It might not look appetizing, but
I've heard the taste is divine.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg010
rows.name:
Since it's so rare, I thought I'd cook
something up with it, but I'm not
sure how...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg011
rows.name:
Meleph-san, do you know?
Do tell, please!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg231
rows.name: How should I respond...?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg012
rows.name: I'm not that great a cook...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg013
rows.name: ...Very well, I'll do it.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg101
rows.name:
Oh, no, that's fine!
I'm happy to do the messy part.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg102
rows.name:
I just need you to tell me the steps,
and then if you could add the spices...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg103
rows.name:
Well, if that is all, I suppose
it should be...fine...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg104
rows.name:
Are you certain, Meleph-sama?
About the spices and everything?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg105
rows.name:
D-don't you worry.
Have some faith in my taste buds...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg106
rows.name:
Right then. So, first, how should we
cook it...?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg107
rows.name:
...A fine question.
Many would eat it grilled, or sliced raw,
but I hear it tastes best in a stew.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg108
rows.name:
Sounds great!
Well then, Meleph-san, can I ask you
to get the stock ready?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg109
rows.name:
Of course.
If I recall, that's made by boiling
the guts...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg110
rows.name:
I think I can leave you to it then!
I'll go buy the other ingredients.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg111
rows.name: ...Roger.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg113
rows.name: ...Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg114
rows.name: Yes, Meleph-sama?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg115
rows.name:
Do we have to begin by gutting
this ugly little creature?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg116
rows.name:
Well, I should think so.
Can you do it?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg117
rows.name:
Erm... I'm not even really sure
which part the guts are...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg118
rows.name:
That would be the parts on the inside.
Consider using a knife.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg119
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg120
rows.name: ...Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg121
rows.name: Yes, what is it now?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg122
rows.name:
The heart...
The heart is still beating!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg123
rows.name:
What should I do?
Should I deliver the coup de gr√¢ce?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg124
rows.name:
I-indeed, that seems wise.
We don't want it fighting back.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg125
rows.name: Kagutsuchi!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg126
rows.name:
It's...looking at me with those eyes,
and moving those lips, like it's accusing
me of something...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg127
rows.name: It's cursing me for taking its heart!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg128
rows.name:
It's no use...
I can't torment the dead any further...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg129
rows.name: Kagutsuchi, I'll leave the rest to you.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg130
rows.name:
Wait just a minute!
You can't force me to
do your dirty work!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg131
rows.name: I'm sorry, but I must!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg132
rows.name:
Meleph-sama! Are you deserting
in the face of the enemy?!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg201
rows.name:
Meleph-sama, if I may.
Is this really wise...?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg202
rows.name: Oh, don't you worry yourself.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg203
rows.name: Shall we start by gutting the fish, then?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg204
rows.name: Excuse me?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg205
rows.name: What's the matter?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg206
rows.name: ...Gut it? Gut this creature?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg207
rows.name:
Well, yes.
We can't exactly cook it like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg208
rows.name:
...Ahem. Understood.
Life is a battlefield. Let us commence.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg209
rows.name: Show it who's boss, Meleph-sama!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg211
rows.name: ...Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg212
rows.name: Yes?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg213
rows.name: Please hold down its head.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg214
rows.name:
Wh-wha...?!
No, I, er, that is...
I'd rather not...touch it.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg215
rows.name:
It's just a little tricky to make the
incision when it keeps...staring at me...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg216
rows.name: Qu-quite true, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg217
rows.name:
For the love of God, do it!
Please, at least cover its eyes for me!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg218
rows.name:
Y-yes, Ma'am.
We cannot let a mere fish
get the best of us!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg219
rows.name: Eeeeeeeeeeek!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg220
rows.name: What's wrong?!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg221
rows.name:
It...It looked me in the eye!
Is this thing still alive?!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg222
rows.name:
Can it be?!
Then I must end it before it strikes!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg223
rows.name: It's opening its foul maw?!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg224
rows.name:
Meleph-sama, the enemy means to
eat us! Quickly, the finishing blow!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg225
rows.name: Very well! Hellfire!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg226
rows.name:
No, wait!
If you do that, the food will be-

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg227
rows.name: ...Well, Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg228
rows.name:
As befits the Flamebringer.
The foe is extinguished without a trace.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg229
rows.name: Phew. Our mission here is done.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg230
rows.name:
What do you think you're doing?!
There's nothing left for us to eat!
